sentence:
Are you concerned about potential market hype and high valuations in the AI sector? 

Section 1 (5 seconds):
AI chips, designed to make building AI systems like ChatGPT faster and cheaper, have suddenly taken center stage in what some experts consider an AI revolution

Section 2 (5 seconds):
Shares of Nvidia, the leading designer of AI chips, skyrocketed 25% last week after the company forecast a huge jump in revenue

Section 3 (5 seconds):
The technology isn’t cheap, with the H100 GPU listing for $30,000
Cloud computing services such as Amazon and Microsoft rent out AI computing power, making it possible for smaller companies to use cloud-based tools

CTA (10 seconds): 
Download the Backchannel app to shape the conversation and see the results! Don’t miss out on the newest trends in the AI sector
